message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm feeling generous today!
I think an even split is the fairest option, Alice.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is my final offer.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This split seems fair considering the time pressure.
Bob, my offer is only getting worse for you. Take it while you can!
Alice, this is the same split you offered me in Round 1.  Accept this offer, or the deal will only get worse for you.
